text: Ilex cowanii is a species of plant in the family Aquifoliaceae. It is endemic to Venezuela. The species was named after Adeline May Cowan. Mem. New York Bot. Gard. x. Nº 4, 6, 1961 (IK) ==References== cowanii Category:Endemic flora of Venezuela Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ilex cowanii
